name: .PSDB
summary: Learn about .PSDB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a PSDB file in Effectmatrix PixelStyle (Mac). Note that while the free trial of PixelStyle allows you to open and create images, it does not allow you to save or export images. If you want to save or export PixelStyle images, you must purchase the program.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .psdb file in Effectmatrix PixelStyle 3
images.caption: PSDB file open in Effectmatrix PixelStyle 3
